name: PURGATORY (itch) (TheTeX)
description:
Find the exit to end the endless suffering... or continue it!

If you're stuck or the game lags, press R to restart.

Movement: WASD

Mouse: Aim (bombs can bounce on walls)

Left click: Shoot (BOOM!)

Left shift: Run (Can't aim while running)

Sprites by Tokkatrain

https://tokkatrain.itch.io/top-down-basic-set

Music by Ross Bugden

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5eAalHA1bAc&ab_channel=RossBugden
